text: Olwa mwali mwitwoma eliasi nabo nibali mwitwoma elia hale, omukanda kwomwandu (kwa Abu Sufiyan) nikuli emwalo wenyu, ne mulakananga ebise mwakhakabukhane, halali ni mbu okhula Nyasaye abusie likhuwa liali nilikhoyekhane okhubura, kho ulia usikha asikhe ebifune bili habulafu, ne unyoola obulamu amenye nende ebifune bili habulafu. Ne toto Nyasaye ni Owokhuwulila Omumanyi muno
